name: The Vaccinator
description:
A VIRUS HAS RAVAGED THE EARTH FOR A LONG TIME. FINALLY A VACCINE IS AVAILABLE, BUT ITS UP TO THE VACCINATOR TO ADMINISTER THE DOSE... QUICKLY...

HOW TO PLAY:

Run around the care home and medicate ALL the infected residents you can before the time runs out. Protect healthy residents by boosting their immunity with a vaccine shot.

CONTROLS:

W A S D    -     Movement Controls
L SHIFT    -     Sprint
RIGHT MOUSE    -    Aim
LEFT MOUSE    -   Fire Shot
R   -    Switch between Vaccine & Medication
